full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,ZHANG BLON RDO RJE BDUD 'DUL GYI GSHEGS GTOR BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES ZHANG BLON RDO RJE BDU 'DUL LA GSHEGS GTOR 'BUL TSUL 'DI NI, BSTAN BSRUNG CHEN PO TSANGS PA DKAR PO'I GSUNG DANG GNAM BSGOS CHING GIS RGYAL PO'I ROL SA 'KHRUS, ,SBYIN BDAG CHEN PO GUNG MI 'GYUR GYI GSUNG GI BSKUL BA LTAR, BLA MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL TSE 'DI LAS GA-YENG PA TSUL KHRIMS MING CAN GYIS BRIS PA DGE BA SEMS CAN THAMS CAD LA BAR CHAD MED PA'I SDIG SGRIB SBYANGS, ,RDO RJE 'CHANG GI GO 'PHANG @004B MYUR DU THOB PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,)
